description:
Natsusa`s neck gets aggravated and he gets stuck in bed. Yuu tries to help fill the void Natsusa had left behind, but finds that he is unable to do as much as he had thought. The starting line-up gets announced and the team prepares for their match.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Novice Cook Will Fail at Food Arrangement Almost 100% of the Time.
Ryouri Shoshinsha no Arrange wa Hobo 100% no Kakuritsu de Shippai Suru
料理初心者のアレンジはほぼ100%の確率で失敗する
